Introduction

Park Moonchi (박문치) is a South Korean singer-songwriter and composer under Magic Strawberry Sound. She is a member of the project girl group CSVC.

She debuted as a soloist on August 23, 2017, under real name Park Bomin (박보민), with the digital single, "My Boo". She changed her stage name to Park Moonchi (박문치) later.
